docs.text: Home I'm currently a postdoc at the Institute of Computer Science in the Hausdorff Center of Mathematics , hosted by Prof. Heiko Röglin . My research interests include online algorithms and approximation algorithms. Email : [last name].[first name] AT outlook.com [first letter of first name][last name] AT uni-bonn.de

docs.text: CV Experience Postdoc , Hausdorff Center of Mathematics at Universität Bonn , Germany. Jan 2022 -- Now Host: Prof. Heiko Röglin EuroTech and Marie Skłodowska-Curie Postdoc Fellow , Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e), Netherland, and Technische Universität München (TUM), Germany. Oct 2020 -- Dec 2021 Host: Prof. Frits Spieksma and Prof. Susanne Albers Supported under the EuroTechPostdoc Programme . Visiting scholar , Institute of Theoretical Computer Science, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics , China. Apr 2019 -- Sep 2019 Host: Prof. Pinyan Lu Visiting scholar , Department of Informatics, University of Leicester , UK. Sep 2017 -- Sep 2018 Host: Prof. Thomas Erlebach Education Ph.D. in Management Science, Xi'an Jiao Tong University , China. 2014 -- 2019. Thesis: Online Car-Sharing Problem with Advance Bookings Advisor: Prof. Yinfeng Xu B.Sc. in Economics and Management, Northwest University , China. 2010 -- 2014.

docs.text: Clustering blalba I'm a \(k\) -median algorithm with \(O(2^k\cdot\mathrm{poly}(n))\) runtime. \[ f(x) = \int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-x^2/7}\mathrm{d}x \]
